text: Abd-Allah ibn Aamir Hadhrami was the governor of the Arabic city of Kufah during the 7th century. He had a prominent role in the Battle of the Camel.Restatement of History of Islam, from Al-Islam.org ==References== Category:Iraqi politicians Category:7th-century people Category:Year of death missing Category:Date of birth unknown
title: Abd-Allah ibn Aamir Hadhrami
